attacks.name: Sleep Inducer
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose 1 of them and switch it with the Defending Pokémon. The new Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Rupture Pollen
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. If tails, remove 2 damage counters from Parasect.
